description: Some of the early pbr rollouts negelcted to include a version pin in setup.py for pbr and d2to1. These should be updated to match the versoin pin in requirements.txt.
title: pbr depend in setup.py should be versioned

comments.content: Some of the early pbr rollouts negelcted to include a version pin in setup.py for pbr and d2to1. These should be updated to match the versoin pin in requirements.txt.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mordred

commit 07ea63a33a4af858401bf80fad6e0bbb58e47f69
Author: Monty Taylor <email address hidden>
Date:   Sat Jul 6 15:35:33 2013 -0400

    Properly pin pbr and d2to1 in setup.py
    
    We did nova first in the pbr transition, so it didn't get the pin
    we added to everyone else later on.
    
    Fixes bug 1199923
    
    Change-Id: I04c3e810f49a1e4388496ff5226cf094c787d1a9
